message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the sale of this fantastic product with you. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $18000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it worth every penny.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $15000 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After reconsidering, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering the product to you for $17000. It's a fair price, considering the value it brings. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $16000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $16000, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm offering the product to you for $16500. This is my final offer, and I hope you'll consider it.
I appreciate your efforts in negotiating, Alice. However, I am unable to match the price of $16500 for the product. I am prepared to offer $16000. This is my final offer.
